LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.label: door opening speed
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.description: The speed at which the door opens.
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.label: rest effectiveness
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.description: How fast people sleeping on this gain rest.
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.label: trap melee damage
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.description: How much damage this trap typically does. The actual damage may vary somewhat.
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.label: trap spring chance
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.description: The likelihood that the trap will spring when an unaware creature passes over it.
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.label: research speed factor
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.description: Speed at which people do research is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.label: medical tend quality offset
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.description: Medical tend quality is offset by this value.
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.label: immunity gain speed factor
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.description: Immunity gain speed is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.label: work speed factor
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.description: Work speed is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.EntertainmentStrengthFactor.label: entertainment strength factor
LanguageData.EntertainmentStrengthFactor.description: How effectively this item entertains people and gives them joy.
